mapper.insert: insert into tb_user( gmt_create, gmt_modify, name, birthday, area_code, phone, email, wechat_username, first_controller_contents, visa_code, visa_expiration_date, source, auth_type, auth_openid, auth_username, auth_nickname, auth_logo, balance, adviser_id, region_id) values ( now(), now(), #{name}, #{birthday}, #{areaCode}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{wechatUsername}, #{firstControllerContents}, #{visaCode}, #{visaExpirationDate}, #{source}, #{authType}, #{authOpenid}, "", #{authNickname}, "", 0, #{adviserId}, #{regionId})
insert into tb_user_adviser( gmt_create, gmt_modify, user_id, adviser_id, is_creater) values ( now(), now(), #{userId}, #{adviserId}, #{isCreater})
mapper.select: SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, user_id AS userId, adviser_id AS adviserId, is_creater AS isCreater FROM tb_user_adviser WHERE user_id = #{userId} ;

SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, name, birthday, area_code AS areaCode, phone, email, wechat_username AS wechatUsername, first_controller_contents AS firstControllerContents, visa_code AS visaCode, visa_expiration_date AS visaExpirationDate, source, auth_type AS authType, auth_openid AS authOpenid, auth_username AS authUsername, auth_nickname AS authNickname, auth_logo AS authLogo, balance, adviser_id AS adviserId, region_id AS regionId FROM tb_user WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER};

SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, name, birthday, phone, email, wechat_username AS wechatUsername, first_controller_contents AS firstControllerContents, visa_code AS visaCode, visa_expiration_date AS visaExpirationDate, source, auth_type AS authType, auth_openid AS authOpenid, auth_username AS authUsername, auth_nickname AS authNickname, auth_logo AS authLogo, balance, adviser_id AS adviserId, region_id AS regionId from tb_user where auth_type = #{thirdType} and auth_openid = #{thirdId}

SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, name, birthday, phone, email, wechat_username AS wechatUsername, first_controller_contents AS firstControllerContents, visa_code AS visaCode, visa_expiration_date AS visaExpirationDate, source, auth_type AS authType, auth_nickname AS authNickname, auth_username AS authUsername, balance, adviser_id AS adviserId FROM tb_user WHERE auth_type != 'V' AND recommend_openid = #{recommendOpenId} ORDER BY gmt_create DESC

SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, name, birthday, phone, email, wechat_username AS wechatUsername, first_controller_contents AS firstControllerContents, visa_code AS visaCode, visa_expiration_date AS visaExpirationDate, source, auth_type AS authType, auth_openid AS authOpenid, auth_username AS authUsername, auth_nickname AS authNickname, auth_logo AS authLogo, balance, adviser_id AS adviserId, region_id AS regionId FROM tb_user WHERE auth_type = 'WECHAT_WORK' and auth_openid = #{authOpenid};
